text: The Football Federation of the Kyrgyz Republic. () is the governing body of football in Kyrgyzstan. The organization controls the Kyrgyzstan national football team, Kyrgyzstan national futsal team and sponsors the top league of Kyrgyz football. ==Competitions controlled by the Federation== * Kyrgyzstan League * Kyrgyzstan League Second Level * Kyrgyzstan Cup * Kyrgyzstan Super Cup * Kyrgyzstan Futsal League * Kyrgyzstan League Women * Ala-Too Cup ==Teams== ==Presidents== == Staff List == {|class="wikitable hlist" style="text-align:left" !Name !Position !Source |- | Kanat Mamatov |President |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |- | Omurbek Kutuyev |Vice President |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |- | Askar Salymbekov |2nd Vice President |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |- | Dastanbek Konobayev |3rd Vice President |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |- | Mederbek Sydykov |General Secretary |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |- | Ainur Kulzhayeva |Treasurer |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |- | Anarbek Ormombekov |Technical Director |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |- | Aleksandr Krestinin |Team Coach (Men's) |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |- | Valery Berezovsky |Team Coach (Women's) |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |- | Natalia Ugriumova |Media/Communications Manager |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |- | Amirzhan Mukanov |Futsal Coordinator |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |- | Emil Busurmankulov |Referee Coordinator |https://www.fifa.com/associations/association/kgz/about |} ==References== ==External links== * Official website * Kyrgyzstan at the FIFA website. * Kyrgyzstan at AFC site Category:Football in Kyrgyzstan Kyrgyzstan Category:Sports organizations established in 1992 Category:1992 establishments in Kyrgyzstan
title: Kyrgyz Football Union
